welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dorking, a charming town nestled in the beautiful countryside of the United Kingdom. Known for its scenic landscapes and historic charm, we invite you to explore and experience all that Dorking has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Gatwick Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'Gatwick Free WiFi' from the list of available networks and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the original terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights for SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then charges apply.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport is a modern and well-equipped facility, offering a range of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport offers exclusive services for private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport is a modern and spacious facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
